Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 67th overall pick, by San Francisco in 2007...
Earned first career win on 9/20/2011...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/28/2012, winning 2 games with a 0.00 ERA...
Had first career hit on 8/21/2012, off Kyle Gibson (MIL)...
Won World Championship with San Francisco in 2012...
Signed as a free agent by Los Angeles (A) on 2/7/2017 to a 1-year deal worth $7,200,000 per year...
Injured on 5/2/2017 with a Broken Finger, out for 5-6 weeks...
Traded from Los Angeles (A) to Pittsburgh on 6/30/2020 (Going to PIT: P D. Baeza. Going to LAA: P J. McLovin)...
Traded from Pittsburgh to Houston on 7/17/2021 (Going to HOU: P D. Baeza, P R. Ellingsworth. Going to PIT: CF H. Rice Jr., P G. Greco)...
